TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartManagerInternals extends System.Object

summary.span: 分离到由 控件使用并且可由扩展该控件的网页开发人员重写的单独的类方法中，但是网页开发人员很少需要使用这些方法。

span.span: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是在 Web 部件控件集中的最大类。The class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set. 它也是最重要的 Web 部件类由于它用于在包含 Web 部件控件，每个网页上，并且它协调和管理页面上的所有 Web 部件控件。It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page. 因为非常频繁，使用类，因为它包含许多公开的方法，某些方法需要主要由控件开发人员扩展控件包含在类。Because the class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the control are contained in the class. 这种隔离的不常用到的方法类可简化的 API类和隔离的方法将不显示在在 IntelliSense 中的对象。This isolation of less-used methods into the class simplifies the API of the class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the object in IntelliSense. 使用开发人员类很可能会有的情况下它们需要从继承控件并广泛地自定义。Developers who use the class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the control and customize it extensively. 例如，如果要构建 Web 门户应用程序或使用自定义显示模式的 Web 部件控件的打包的集，自定义区域、 自定义谓词，自定义控件，并在许多情况下 （非基本 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 的其他扩展全部） 你将需要重写和扩展的一些成员。For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the members. 尽管类密封的因此不能从它，您的自定义继承类将很可能需要拨打的号码方法中，以便管理页面上的 Web 部件控件。And although the class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom class will likely need to call a number of the methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page. > [!NOTE] > 像类，类提供了一个没有用户界面且永远不会显示在页面上的服务器控件。Like the class, the class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page. 与不同，则类永远不会在页面的标记中声明; 它完全是执行后台任务的工作对象。Unlike , the class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks. 通过演示其使用的常见方式类，该类引用通过受保护属性，并使用所引用的对象来调用方法。The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the class, which references it by means of the protected property, and uses the referenced object to call the methods. 类只包含方法; 没有任何属性或事件。The class contains only methods; there are no properties or events. 在类中的所有方法，都涉及管理控件之间的连接。All the methods in the class involve managing controls, or connections between controls. 若要处理控件，包括将它们添加的方法 ()，删除它们)，处理事件)、 获取或设置与其他区域的有关其关系的详细信息 (例如， 并)，或设置基本控制属性 (例如，和)。To handle controls, includes methods for adding them (), removing them ), handling events ), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, and ), or setting basic control properties (for example, and ). 若要处理的连接，包括用于删除它们的方法 ()，设置要使用的转换器对象 ()，并设置连接是否共享以及它是否为静态 (和)，并设置要使用的连接错误消息 ()。To handle connections, includes methods for deleting them (), setting which transformer object to use (), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static ( and ), and setting a connection error message to use ().

span.span: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含所引用的控件的区域的 ID`webPart`参数。The method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 的属性`webPart`引用包含的实际区域对象`webPart`，不是区域的 ID。The property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone. 如果`webPart`当前已关闭，则其属性是`null`，和方法将返回的最后一个 ID 区域`webPart`前关闭。If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its property is `null`, and the method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetConnectErrorMessage (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string connectErrorMessage);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 参与和另一个控件的连接的 。

span.span: A that participates in a connection with another control.

param.name: connectErrorMessage
param.span: 包含错误信息文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

summary.span: 建立错误信息，并且使得负责呈现 控件的 对象呈现该消息而不是呈现控件的内容。

span.span: Establishes an errors message, and causes the object that is responsible for rendering a control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可将相关联的错误消息参与连接的控件。The method allows you to associate an error message with a control that participates in connections. 如果在另一个控件与所引用的控件建立连接时发生错误`webPart`参数，则用户界面 (UI) 中显示的错误消息的连接过程已失败后，而不是的内容`webPart`.If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`. 对象与关联`webPart`呈现中的错误消息及其方法。The object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置属性的`webPart`。The method sets the property of `webPart`. 此方法不会实际关闭`webPart`; 它仅设置属性，指示是否`webPart`已关闭。This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性或 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用中设置一个属性，指示是否共享控件的特定实例的基类的方法。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared. 在 Web 部件控件集，共享的控件表示页的所有用户可见的控件。In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page. 这与每个用户控件，这是仅对将控件添加到页面的特定用户可见。This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page. > [!NOTE] > 有关更多个性化和共享与每个用户控件，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsShared (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isShared);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 此方法为其设置 属性的 。

span.span: A for which this method sets the property.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指示 是否为共享的布尔值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether is shared.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不实际上会导致所引用的控件`webPart`参数来共享; 它仅设置属性，指示是否`webPart`当前共享。The method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不实际上会导致所引用的控件`connection`参数来共享; 它仅设置属性，指示是否`connection`当前共享。The method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置属性。The method sets the property. 当此属性设置为`true`上控件，这意味着控件不包含在区域。When this property is set to `true` on a control, it means that the control is not contained within a zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性或 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control or the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用中设置一个属性，指示是否为静态控件的特定实例的基类的方法。The method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static. 在 Web 部件控件集，静态控件是在 Web 页的标记中声明的控件。In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page. 这是与动态控件，以编程方式添加到页或通过用户从控件目录添加形成对比。This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls. 静态控件本质上是共享的控件，这意味着它的页上，所有用户可见，尽管用户可以关闭了静态控件，还可以永远不会删除 （永久删除） 它。A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it. > [!NOTE] > 个性化设置的详细信息，静态与动态控件，并共享与每个用户控件，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIsStatic (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIsStatic(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, bool isStatic) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 为其设置属性值的控件。

span.span: The control for which the property value is being set.

param.name: isStatic
param.span: 指示 是否为静态的布尔值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether is static.

summary.span: 设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来设置所引用的控件的属性值`webPart`参数。The method is used to set the property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. 如果`webPart`区域中的网页上，此方法将属性值的设置为标记中声明`true`。If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`webPart`添加到页面以编程方式，或由用户通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，则此方法将属性值设置为`false`。If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

summary.span: 设置 对象的 属性。

span.span: Sets the property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来设置引用的连接的属性值`connection`参数。The method is used to set the property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter. 如果`connection`网页上，此方法将属性值的设置为在标记中声明`true`。If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`. 如果`connection`添加到页面以编程方式，或由用户通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，则此方法将属性值设置为`false`。If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetTransformer(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection connection, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer transformer) cil managed
Public Sub SetTransformer (connection As WebPartConnection, transformer As WebPartTransformer)

param.name: connection
param.span: 创建服务器控件之间的连接的 。

span.span: A that creates a connection between server controls.

param.name: transformer
param.span: 将与 一起使用的 。

span.span: A to be used with .

summary.span: 分配一个将在两个服务器控件之间的连接中使用的 对象。

span.span: Assigns a object to be used in a connection between two server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个服务器控件之间的连接需要转换器，以便使用者控件可以解释数据提供者控件中，从方法调用提供一个特定对象传递给对象。When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the method is called to supply a specific object to the object. 如果连接已经使用了分配给它的转换器，引用的对象`transformer`参数会重写现有; 否则，在引用的对象`transformer`使用参数。If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used. 控件使用方法每次调用方法以建立的连接，需要转换。The control uses the method whenever you call the method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneID (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, string zoneID) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正在设置其 属性值的 。

span.span: The whose property value is being set.

param.name: zoneID
param.span: 包含 所属的区域的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the zone that belongs to.

summary.span: 设置一个允许 或服务器控件保留包含区域的 ID 的属性。

span.span: Sets a property that enables a or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法控制何时控件添加到区域。This method is called by the control when a control is being added to a zone. 每个控件跟踪其所属的区域的 ID 和此方法设置保留的 ID 值的属性。Each control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetZoneIndex (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int zoneIndex);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetZoneIndex(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, int32 zoneIndex) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 一个 控件，该方法为该控件设置区域索引。

span.span: A control for which the method sets a zone index.

param.name: zoneIndex
param.span: 其区域中相对于该区域中其他控件的 的索引。

span.span: The index of within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.

summary.span: 在特定控件所在区域中设置相对于该区域中其他 控件的该特定控件的索引。

span.span: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other controls within the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定序号位置`webPart`占用其在区域中，相对于该区域中其他服务器控件。The method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
